messages.subject: hi, and question
messages.msgSnippet: ... YIKES!  Stay safe. We had a night like that once when we lived in a somewhat seedy apartment complex in Columbia.  We were out on our balcony relaxing when
messages.messageBody:
> The police were looking for him last week with a HELICOPTER (and three cars).

YIKES! Stay safe.

We had a night like that once when we lived in a somewhat seedy apartment
complex in Columbia. We were out on our balcony relaxing when five cops
came across the lawn with their guns drawn asking for building 333. We were
like, "Uh, that's this one. Listen, we're, uh, going inside now!"

I wanted to ask if you were still good with bringing that plate for Kelly,
or if it might be easier for you to mail it, and I'll just pay you when you
get here? I don't want you to feel overloaded. It occurred to me later
that you'll have boxes of tapes and maybe thinking sticks, and presentation
stuff, too. Sorry I saddled you with this.

We're staying with Kelly's mom now. It's better, Tim and Duncan just didn't
work out together. I had a great time up in Greenville with my friend from
Germany who moved to SC. Tim says he's definitely going to marry her
daughter now. :)

See you later this week. Maybe I'll be done ranting at Deniz by then....<g>

brenda

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] hi, and question
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/18/03 7:22:53 AM, abtleo@earthlink.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/18/03 7:22:53 AM, abtleo@... writes:

<< I wanted to ask if you were still good with bringing that plate for Kelly,
or if it might be easier for you to mail it, and I'll just pay you when you
get here? >>

La la la (Shhhhhhhhhhhh. That wasn't private e-mail.)
Yes, Keith the greatest packer has packed it up.

Say no more.
